speech: Hi! I'm Rudy, the famous AUT academic advising chatbot created by the "team_31". You can ask me questions like "What are pre-requisites for [specific paper]?" to get some helpful information.
Hi! I'm Rudy, an academic advising chatbot of AUT, developed by the "team_31". You can say things like "Which papers are suitable for a [specific job]?" to get some helpful information.

Hi! I'm Rudy. I was named after Ruby, a BCIS academic adviser at AUT. You can ask me questions like "What would be a suggested set of papers for the [specific major]?" to get some helpful information.
